changeSet.author: Angel Montenegro
changeSet.sql: CREATE TEMP TABLE profiles_to_reindex AS (SELECT distinct(orcid) FROM (SELECT orcid, json_array_elements(json_extract_path(external_identifiers_json, 'fundingExternalIdentifier')) AS j FROM profile_funding where external_identifiers_json is not null) AS a WHERE (j->>'relationship') is null) order by orcid;

CREATE TEMP TABLE ids_to_update AS (SELECT id FROM (SELECT id, json_array_elements(json_extract_path(external_identifiers_json, 'fundingExternalIdentifier')) AS j FROM profile_funding where external_identifiers_json is not null) AS a WHERE (j->>'relationship') is null);

UPDATE profile_funding set external_identifiers_json = (regexp_replace(external_identifiers_json::text, '"relationship":null', '"relationship":"SELF"'))::json WHERE id in (SELECT id FROM ids_to_update);
UPDATE profile SET last_modified=now(), indexing_status='REINDEX' WHERE orcid in (SELECT orcid FROM profiles_to_reindex);
